Catalog_Raisonne: Chiba City Museum of Art, Keisai Eisen (2012), #100; Ukiyo-e shûka 14 (1981), Hiroshige list, p. 246, horizontal ôban #33.31
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
markings: publisher's seal: {Hōeidō}; publisher's seal on girth: 林 {rin} (Iseya Rihei)
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: The Sixty-nine Stations of the Kisokaidō, here called Kisokaidō 木曾街道
text: Later edition published by Iseya Rihei (not Takenouchi).
title: No. 31, Shiojiri Pass: View of Lake Suwa
